titleStmt.title: Publique bathes purged. Or, A reply to Dr Chamberlain his Vindication of publique artificial bathes from the pretended objections and scandals obtruded on them.

notesStmt.note: An anonymous response to: Chamberlen, Peter. A vindication of publick artificiall baths & bath-stoves from the objections and scandalls obtruded on them, by those that do not, or will not know their great benefit to the publick.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
